description: This video includes an architectural overview of OpenShift, a freely-available Open Source project designed to standardize cloud-based app hosting. By the end of this video you should be able to shift your own PostgreSQL-backed apps directly from GitHub into your own public or private cloud.
short_description: This video includes an architectural overview of OpenShift, a freely-available Open Source project designed to standardize cloud
title: Ryan Jarvinen: Writing Portable PostgreSQL - backed network applications for the open cloud
